name: The curious Tree
description:
An interactive experience made for the 2010 Olympics game at the art gallery

Goals

Create 4 different apps and animations for a cube with 4 touch screen.

Tools

  • Flash for the animations and the app
  • UDP port connexion to pass the touch position from the touch app to Flashh

Made at

Switch United
